com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider

类 SystemUiHiderBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider.SystemUiHider
      • com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider.SystemUiHiderBase
  • 直接已知子类:
    SystemUiHiderHoneycomb

    public class SystemUiHiderBase
extends SystemUiHider
    A base implementation of SystemUiHider. Uses APIs available in all API levels to show and hide the status bar.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider.SystemUiHider
